name: df-mpaa
body: |- wceq(cmpaa, cmpt(s0, caa, crio(s1, cfv(cply, cq), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgraa, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgraa, cv(s0))), nat1)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ minPolyAA =(s0 ∈ AA ↦ iota(s1 ∈(Poly ` ℚ),((deg ` s1)=(degAA ` s0)∧(s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(degAA ` s0))= 1)))
comment: Define the minimal polynomial of an algebraic number as the unique monic polynomial which achieves the minimum of ` degAA ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.)
